message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a larger share, but let's be more realistic. This offer benefits us both.
I'll compromise, but I still think I deserve the larger share
Time is running out, Alice. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but that's as low as I'll go
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Don't let greed make us both lose.
